meanings.definition: A person or organization that certifies something.
meanings.sent1: The certifiers at the school ensure that all students meet the requirements.
meanings.sent2: The certifiers issued a stamp of approval for the new product.
meanings.sent3: The certifiers were so strict, they even checked the color of the ink used.
meanings.sent4: She was like a certifier of truth, always verifying the facts.
meanings.sent5: The certifiers acted as the gatekeepers of quality in the industry.

meanings.definition: A device or mechanism used for certifying.
meanings.sent1: The company invested in new certifiers to improve their production process.
meanings.sent2: The certifiers beeped loudly when the document was verified.
meanings.sent3: The certifiers looked like tiny robots, ensuring everything was in order.
meanings.sent4: The certifiers functioned like a security system, granting access only to approved items.
meanings.sent5: The certifiers hummed softly as they validated each item passing through.
